name: Cub vs Wallz
description:
This is my 1st Game i ever made.
I started of following a tutorial from brackeys: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL
After that i let my creative mind go to work and added a few new mechanics 15 fun levels a levelselector and 2 endless modes.
I hope you guys will like it :D
